section.heading: Notice requirements.
section.text: The Administrator shall provide notice of the requirements of this part to:

para.text: The relevant staff at the place of confinement, including:
Staff and contractors who are involved in the transport of confined youth of child-bearing age; and
Other staff as the Administrator deems appropriate; and
All youth who are in their third trimester of pregnancy at the time the place of confinement takes custody of the person.
